# controlSize

**Instance Property**

The size of the tab view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var controlSize: NSControl.ControlSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

The valid values for this property are described inControl Sizes in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell]. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRegularControlSize].

## Determining the Size

- **minimumSize**: The minimum size necessary for the tab view to display tabs in a useful way.
- **contentRect**: The rectangle describing the content area of the tab view.
